ygData.subject: Re: Cazic Thule
ygData.msgSnippet: The Dual wield is great I use the Tomahawk and a Combine LS so I can beat up on ghouls, scarecrows and such, but you need to ditch one of the Mino axes, get
ygData.messageBody:
The Dual wield is great I use the Tomahawk and a Combine LS so I can beat up
on ghouls, scarecrows and such, but you need to ditch one of the Mino axes,
get the dirk if ya can, Two mino axes will:

1. Kill your stamina and force you to use the jig in combat
2. due to the longer delays, you will not advance in 1H slash OR Dual
Wield near as fast.

Jaezebel Songblade, Gypsy Bard of the 19th Stanza
Inouruuk
-----Original Message-----
From: Bard <dabard@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>

Subject: Re: [eqbards] Cazic Thule


>From: "Bard" <dabard@...>

> From what I have heard from druid and mage friends is "no" (at least
for
>their spells, but I don't think there would be much difference between the
>spell and the song). Once you rae targeted by a crit, you stay targeted
>until you zone or get out of it's aggro area. (Found out about the aggro
>area in EK the other night when I would outrun a griffawn or an extra gnoll
>reaver while trying to drag it to a druid friend of mine nwho was kiting
>crags near he barb fishing village.)
> If you escapeit's aggro area, it will seem to forget about you until
you
>get back in the area. (Or maybe they just knew I would be bacK? Damned IA
>=oPP )
>-=B=-
>NOR Bard, Esq.
>Just made 17th Wheeeeee!!! (Any ideas on best weapons to Dual? Since I
had
